room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Minneapolis in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Very challenging escape the room but be warned: if you donâ€™t have a full group of 8 they may pair you with random people who may hold you back.

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Minneapolis in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: We signed up for prison break and were one clue away from winning. This was our first time doing one of these and were so happy we did. We definitely will be looking for other places near our home to do these as we were visiting. Definitely recommend to anyone.

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Minneapolis in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Did the Prison Break with my boyfriend and we had so much fun! Was an awesome idea for a date night and would definitely go back!The staff and our host Jason was also wonderful! Very friendly and very willing to help walk us through everything as it was our first time!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Minneapolis in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Oh my goodness, so much fun! We did Prison Break with a a group of 6 and we all had a blast! It was a very tough challenge and we were a few challenges away from solving it, but it was a blast! Can't wait to go back and solve another room. Thanks for the fun entertainment!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Minneapolis in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Even though we were paired with a group of strangers we've just met, it was beyond a fantastic experience! We chose Prison Break and it was great! We were so excited and were the first group to win that one! Very clever puzzles. Will absolutely go again to try every room! A must do if you are looking for something to make you think and have a small adrenaline rush as the time runs out!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Minneapolis in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Me and a group of 5 best friends from high school are always looking for new and fun things to do when we get together. We decided we'd book an escape room here to see what it was like. We ended up doing Prison Break and we were one challenge away from finishing before time ran out! It was extremely entertaining! Everyone at this location was very nice and provided an excellent experience. We will definitely consider returning for another escape room!
